TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpRequestCachePolicy extends System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy

summary.span: 定義使用 物件取得的資源的應用程式快取需求。

span.span: Defines an application's caching requirements for resources obtained by using objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您也可以使用您的應用程式指定預設快取原則屬性或應用程式或電腦組態檔。You can specify a default cache policy for your application by using the property or the application or machine configuration files. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ <requestCaching>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see [<requestCaching> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md). 您可以使用指定的個別要求的快取原則屬性。You can specify the cache policy for an individual request by using the property. 不支援 Web 服務的快取。Caching for Web services is not supported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立應用程式定義域的預設快取原則，並會覆寫它的要求。The following code example creates a default cache policy for the application domain, and overrides it for a request. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#2)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會將 屬性初始化為 。This constructor initializes the property to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定使用這個建構函式的快取原則。The following code example demonstrates setting the cache policy using this constructor. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.DateTime cacheSyncDate) cil managed

param.name: cacheSyncDate
param.span: 物件，指定儲存在快取中的資源必須重新確認的時間。

span.span: A object that specifies the time when resources stored in the cache must be revalidated.

summary.span: 使用指定的快取同步處理日期，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified cache synchronization date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取同步處理日期可讓您指定必須重新驗證快取內容的絕對日期。The cache synchronization date allows you to specify an absolute date when cached contents must be revalidated. 如果快取項目上次重新驗證快取同步處理日期之前，會發生與伺服器的重新驗證。If the cache entry was last revalidated prior to the cache synchronization date, revalidation with the server occurs. 如果快取同步處理的日期之後重新確認快取項目，而且沒有任何伺服器重新驗證需求，讓快取的項目無效，則會使用從快取的項目。If the cache entry was revalidated after the cache synchronization date and there are no server revalidation requirements that make the cached entry invalid, the entry from the cache is used. 如果快取同步處理日期設定為未來的日期，則每次要求時都會重新驗證項目，直到快取同步處理日期已過為止。If the cache synchronization date is set to a future date, the entry is revalidated every time it is requested, until the cache synchronization date passes. 這個建構函式會將 屬性初始化為 。This constructor initializes the property to . 屬性會初始化為 `cacheSyncDate`。The property is initialized to `cacheSyncDate`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立根據快取同步處理日期的快取原則。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy based on a cache synchronization date. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Net.Cache.HttpRequestCacheLevel level) cil managed

span.span: An value.

summary.span: 使用指定的快取原則，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified cache policy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會將 屬性初始化為 `level`。This constructor initializes the property to `level`. 值控制是否啟用快取，以及何時可以使用快取。The value controls whether caching is enabled, and when the cache can be used. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件。For additional information, see the documentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立的快取原則允許快取來從快取中找到的資源。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy that allows resources found in the cache to be used from the cache. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#12)]

summary.span: 使用指定的保留期限控制和時間值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified age control and time values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `cacheAgeControl`值定義的意義`ageOrFreshOrStale`參數值，用來設定相關聯的屬性。The `cacheAgeControl` value defines the meaning of the `ageOrFreshOrStale` parameter value and is used to set the associated property. 例如，當您指定、屬性設定的值為`ageOrFreshOrStale`參數。For example, when you specify , the property is set to the value of the `ageOrFreshOrStale` parameter. 這個建構函式會將 屬性初始化為 。This constructor initializes the property to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立最小有效期限為基礎的快取原則。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy based on minimum freshness. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#5)]

exception.span: 為 參數指定的值無法與這個建構函式同時使用。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter cannot be used with this constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `cacheAgeControl`值會用來解譯的意義`freshOrStale`參數值與集合相關聯的屬性。The `cacheAgeControl` value is used to interpret the meaning of the `freshOrStale` parameter value and set the associated property. 例如，當您指定、屬性設定的值為`freshOrStale`參數。For example, when you specify , the property is set to the value of the `freshOrStale` parameter. 當您指定、屬性使用的值設定`maxAge`參數和屬性使用的值設定`freshOrStale`參數。When you specify , the property is set using the value of the `maxAge` parameter and the property is set using the value of the `freshOrStale` parameter. 請注意，除非您指定或、屬性未設定。Note that unless you specify or , the property is not set. 這個建構函式會將 屬性初始化為 。This constructor initializes the property to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立根據最小有效期限和最長使用期限的快取原則。The following code example demonstrates creating a cache policy based on minimum freshness and maximum age. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取同步處理日期可讓您指定必須重新驗證快取內容的絕對日期。The cache synchronization date allows you to specify an absolute date when cached contents must be revalidated. 如果快取項目上次重新驗證快取同步處理日期之前，會發生與伺服器的重新驗證。If the cache entry was last revalidated prior to the cache synchronization date, revalidation with the server occurs. 如果快取同步處理的日期之後重新確認快取項目，而且沒有任何伺服器重新驗證需求，讓快取的項目無效，則會使用從快取的項目。If the cache entry was revalidated after the cache synchronization date and there are no server revalidation requirements that make the cached entry invalid, the entry from the cache is used. 如果快取同步處理日期設定為未來的日期，則每次要求時都會重新驗證項目，直到快取同步處理日期已過為止。If the cache synchronization date is set to a future date, the entry is revalidated every time it is requested, until the cache synchronization date passes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of this property. summary.span: 取得建立這個執行個體時所指定的 值。

span.span: Gets the value that was specified when this instance was created.

value.span: 值，指定使用 物件取得之資源的快取行為。

span.span: A value that specifies the cache behavior for resources that were obtained using objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式通常使用做為其快取原則層級。Applications typically use as their cache policy level. 屬性，如果不是`null`，判斷要求的作用中的快取原則。The property, if not `null`, determines the cache policy in effect for a request. 可以使用設定的應用程式定義域的預設原則屬性或機器中的設定或應用程式組態檔。The default policy for the application domain can be set using the property or by settings in the machine or application configuration files. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ <requestCaching>項目 （網路設定）](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md)。For more information, see [<requestCaching> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#11)]

public: property TimeSpan MaxAge { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 取得從快取傳回之資源所允許的最長保留期限。

span.span: Gets the maximum age permitted for a resource returned from the cache.

value.span: 值，該值設為建立這個執行個體時指定的最長保留期限值。

span.span: A value that is set to the maximum age value specified when this instance was created.

value.span: 如果未指定日期，則這個屬性的值為 。

span.span: If no date was specified, this property's value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超過指定的時間值之資源的快取的副本，資源必須重新驗證。If the cached copy of the resource is older than the specified time value, the resource must be revalidated. 建構執行個體時，會指定此屬性的值。The value for this property is specified when the instance is constructed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclSimpleCache#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CPP/NCLSimpleCache.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NclSimpleCache#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLSimpleCache/CS/example.cs#7)]

summary.span: 取得從快取傳回之資源所允許的最大過時值。

span.span: Gets the maximum staleness value that is permitted for a resource returned from the cache.

value.span: 值，該值設為建立這個執行個體時指定的最大過時值。

span.span: A value that is set to the maximum staleness value specified when this instance was created.

value.span: 如果未指定日期，則這個屬性的值為 。

span.span: If no date was specified, this property's value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性指定的期間，快取的副本的資源是可接受的內容到期之後的時間量。This property specifies the amount of time after content expiration during which the cached copy of the resource is acceptable. 建構執行個體時，會指定此屬性的值。The value for this property is specified when the instance is constructed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property.
